RumorFact.Text: The museum has restored an old exhibit that's been in storage for a while. It can be found behind the stairs.

AltText.Text: The museum has an alien plate on display. While it doesn't seem to be Nomai in origin, its creator is unknown.

ExploreFact.Text: The plate has a map of two solar systems carved on it. One is our system, but the other is a nearby system, Hearth's Neighbor. With a warp drive in one's ship, one could warp to that system and check it out.
The plate was left by the sole survivor of Hearth's Neighbor's inhabitants. They had crashed onto our planet and lived here until the end of their days.

RumorFact.Text: The damage report from the Derelict Ship showed an escape pod land on Timber Hearth. A signal from the ship connected to it.

ExploreFact.Text: The pod is intact! Whoever landed here survived, though what happened to them is a mystery lost to time. The plate at the museum came from the hull of the pod, likely carved out by the survivor(s) wanting to leave a message of where they came from.
You have finished the Jam version of Hearth's Neighbor! Congrats! Of course, there may still be a few secrets remaining...
